query:
SELECT 
  c.name as category,
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as product_count,
  ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products), 2) as percentage
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId AND pc.isPrimary = 1
LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.categoryId = c.id
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY product_count DESC;
